goosegame

Interface Cell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicCell, BounceCell, StartCell, TeleportCell, TrapCell, WaitCell

    public interface Cell
    Interface for the cells of the "jeu de l'oie" game. Note that there can be only one player by cell, the starting cell (index 0) excepted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeft() 
      int getIndex()
      returns the index of this cell
      Player getPlayer()
      gets the player in this cell null if none
      int handleMove(int diceThrow)
      returns the index of the cell really reached by a player when the player reaches this cell.
      boolean isBusy()
      returns true if a player is in this cell
      void welcomePlayer(Player player)
      handles what happens when a player arrives in this cell

    • Method Detail

      • canBeLeft

        boolean canBeLeft()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the player in this cell can freely leaves the cell, else he must wait for another player to reach this cell or wait a given number of turns we assume it's called once per turn

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        returns the index of this cell
        Returns:
        the index of this cell

      • handleMove

        int handleMove(int diceThrow)
        returns the index of the cell really reached by a player when the player reaches this cell. For normal cells, the returned value equals getIndex() and is thus independent from diceThrow.
        Parameters:
        diceThrow - the result of the dice when the player reaches this cell
        Returns:
        the index of the actual cell where the player eventually arrives when the given throw of dice sends the player in this cell

      • isBusy

        boolean isBusy()
        returns true if a player is in this cell
        Returns:
        true if a player is in this cell

      • welcomePlayer

        void welcomePlayer(Player player)
        handles what happens when a player arrives in this cell
        Parameters:
        player - the new player in the sell

      • getPlayer

        Player getPlayer()
        gets the player in this cell null if none
        Returns:
        the player in this cell null if none
